File libsrc/libmath/correlate.c

Public Functions

correlate 
 float correlate(float *x,
                 double fx,
                 float *y,
                 double fy,
                 int n)
Compute correlation coefficient. Returns correlation coefficient of arrays x & y. fx and fy are scaling factors to flip traces if desired. The correlation coefficient returned is: 
      c = sum_xy / sqrt( (sum_xx * sum_yy) )

Parameters:
x - Input array of n values.
fx - x scaling factor. x will be multiplied by fx.
y - Input array of n values.
fy - y scaling factor. y will be multiplied by fy.
n - Input number of values in x and y.
Returns:
The correlation coefficient. Returns zero if x and y are all zero.
